name: ip_locator
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ip_geolocation_metadata.
Tool description: Get all metadata from an IP address
API description: Fetches geolocation information for a given IP address using RapidAPI.

ip_address.description: The IP address for which geolocation information is to be retrieved.

format.description: Specify the desired format as part of the request uri and the response will be formatted accordingly.
